page.title: 07HEALTH IN HARLOW
page.content: Health in Harlow There are four Health Centres in our grid reference,Keats House,Lister House,Osler House and Sydenham House. Each centre has one or two practices and 3-9 Doctors looking after about 20 000 patients.Each centre has a District Nurse,with Keats having four and a speech therapist.A Doctor at Lister speaks Cantonese and takes patients from the whole area.Sydenham House has a slimming group and runs a no appointment system.A special allergy clinic is at Lister House. Every centre except Sydenham has at least one Dentist.Most centres have Family Planning Clinics but don't have X ray machines or give out drugs to patients.Doctors may make upto 20 House calls a day in summer and 30 in winter.The District Nurse visits homes for general nursing support.
